WorkItem.Description:
I am presently using an IMutableBidirectionalGraph, and any time a vertex or edge is deleted it likes to relayout itself. My XAML setup is:

        <v:StateGraphLayout Graph="{Binding Path=GraphData}"
                            LayoutAlgorithmType="KK"
                            OverlapRemovalAlgorithmType="FSA"
							HighlightAlgorithmType="Simple">

In any case, every time it does a relayout it seems to shift down and to the right. As a result, the graph quickly disappears off the screen. You may want to fix this, as I suspect it is not the intended behavior for layout. :)
WorkItem.Summary: Layout likes to dance off the screen
